original_text: The Son shows us completely what God is like. He shines with God's great glory. His nature is the same as God's nature. The Son's powerful word causes everything to continue. He himself made it possible for us to be clean from our sins. After he had done that, he returned to heaven. He went and he sat at the right side of God, who rules with all authority.
korean_text: 이는 하나님의 영광의 광채시요 그 본체의 형상이시라 그의 능력의 말씀으로 만물을 붙드시며 죄를 정결하게 하는 일을 하시고 높은 곳에 계신 지극히 크신 이의 우편에 앉으셨느니라

sentences.original_text: The Son shows us completely what God is like.
sentences.korean_translation: 아들은 하나님이 어떤 분인지 완전히 우리에게 보여줍니다.

sentences.original_text: He shines with God's great glory.
His nature is the same as God's nature.
The Son's powerful word causes everything to continue.
sentences.korean_translation: 아들의 강력한 말씀이 모든 것을 계속 유지하게 합니다.

sentences.original_text: He himself made it possible for us to be clean from our sins.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 자신이 우리가 죄에서 깨끗해질 수 있게 만들었습니다.

sentences.original_text: After he had done that, he returned to heaven.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것을 한 후에, 그는 하늘로 돌아갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: He went and he sat at the right side of God,
